name: Kricketune
flavorText: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.

attacks.name: Sore Performance
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Concerto
attacks.text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Kricketot and each Kricketune you have in play.
